name: freezingly
content:
freezingly adverb
(SEVERE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is severe and unfriendly, or lacking imagination, warmth, or energy: The new office is decorated in almost freezingly good taste. One of the letters, on a business topic, is freezingly severe in tone.
More examplesFewer examples"We are not gambling", said Victoria freezingly, "we are simply watching".Erika was freezingly polite.
